body.content:
Hello,

   My name is Mr Martinent CLAUDE I am married to Mrs Elène ADAM of Canadian nationality. She was a consulting engineer in the Republic of Benin for nine (9) years and died following a traffic accident with our only child Unique Marie.

I plan to bequeath a part of my fortune which was bequeathed to me by my late wife since after years of worry I had let myself go to the inadvisable substances and now I suffer from a brain tumor and after several health examinations my doctor revealed to me that I would not survive much longer.

   Indeed, it is the property of my beloved wife. I would be grateful to give you these goods which can help you in your projects, however I beg you to accept this because it is a gesture that I make without ulterior motive, and also without asking for anything in return, and it is one of the reasons why I preferred to do my research directly on Bing, and Google .... Hence the chance of being able to come into contact with a person from the third world.

       Following that I will send you the details.
 ........................ Looking forward to hearing from you, receive my sincere and sincere greetings.

Yours,

   Personal e-mail: communication.planpl@mail.fr
.................................................. .................

We are never as happy as in the happiness we give. To give is to receive.
   
       Yours,

cordially


 Mr MARTINIENT
